Title: men's akr453yg mechanical skeleton gold-tone pocket watch
Description: HomeAbout UsFeedbackNewsletter Akribos XXIV Men's AKR453YG Mechanical Skeleton Gold-Tone Pocket Watch Item Description Gold-tone brass case with a iron chain bracelet. Fixed gold-tone bezel. White sunray dial with black hands and Roman numerals hour markers. Dial Type: Analog. Automatic movement. 2650s engine. Scratch resistant mineral crystal. Push/pull crown. Screw-down case back. Case diameter: 50 mm. Case thickness: 7 mm. Round case shape. Water resistant at 10 meters / 33 feet. Functions: hour, minute, second. Casual watch style. Akribos XXIV Bravura Pocket Watch AK453YG.
